message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  What do you say?
I think a 55/45 split is a more fair starting point. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's split it evenly this time.  We can both do better than a 55/45 split, and we can still get a good deal.  What do you say?
